title: I have Turkish blood in my body, how can I put it off? (TEFC)
creator_credit: Neil Munro and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: An interview with two Turkish girls living in Australia which highlights family life in Turkish culture in comparison to Anglo Australian family life. Further it demonstrates clearly the substantial differences between sub-groups in the Turkish community.
title_for_label: I have Turkish blood in my body, how can I put it off? (TEFC)
